body: Hi Chris, I download the file which was posted by you, But I can not understand a part of this logic, as following: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/uTe6u2oo9t8K3D7GOPOMa7Xuur*Qo0hviTqT7wxh-bRJfuyeSsBxqhJsCxJ9ZON*0*mzJ*2k0akfhZDgL*mctM*3549QMvtm/RadiantAsymmetry2.png) Could you please give some instruction to me, or tell me which does the standard include this logic.
